name: 2nd Edition of International Conference on Materials Science And Engineering
content: Magnus Group extends a warm invitation to you to participate in its “2nd Edition of International Conference on Materials Science and Engineering” Materials 2022 (HYBRID EVENT) which will be held during March 28-30, 2022 at Singapore. The event will be in hybrid format with both onsite and online versions. Materials 2022 will provide a chance for academics and industry leaders across the national and international countries, through panels and lectures, plenary sessions, oral papers and poster presentations, to share their research experiences and research efforts. It is the major platform for multidisciplinary and worldwide public presentation of research. The scientific agenda of the materials congress will lay a strong emphasis on cross-disciplinary research in both basic and practical domains. The consortium aims to highlight the latest advancements in materials research at international level. This would be an excellent opportunity to network and foster eternal collaboration. On behalf of our beloved Organizing Committee, we invite all of you to this preeminent event, in which renowned researchers, researchers and other allied people from all over the world share their exciting trendy results concerning the materials science world.
